item.title: Chicago Videographer Needed For Multi-Day Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture high-quality video footage during our cultural immersion project in Chicago, happening on July 23rd and 24th. The videographer will join our team of researchers as we explore various neighborhoods for cultural insights.

Project Overview: The goal is to record B-roll that captures the spirit and environment of each location and activity. Events include a variety of outdoor and indoor activities TBD, specifics of which will be provided closer to the dates.

Technical Specifications:
- High-definition video footage required.
- A mix of wide shots and close-ups to reflect diverse experiences.
- Audio capture for ambient sounds is essential, especially during tours.

Logistics:
- The activities will be both outdoors and indoors, with exact meet-up times and locations confirmed closer to the date.
- We require dynamic footage capturing interactions, detailed shots of art and artifacts, and panoramic shots of venues.
- Raw footage should be transferred to a jump drive post-event; no editing required from your side.

Timeline and Cost: Please indicate your availability for the mentioned dates and provide any preliminary costs associated with the shooting days. We aim to finalize details ASAP for smooth project coordination.

If you are interested in helping us visually capture the vibrancy and impact of this cultural immersion project, please apply with your portfolio and any compensation expectations.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:12 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Business, Lifestyle, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editors Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a skilled video editor with a passion for creating high-quality content? We're looking for talented freelancers to help us reproduce, retouch, and edit short form video materials into professional-grade videos. This is a project-based opportunity with the potential for ongoing collaboration.

What We’re Looking For:

1. Expertise in short form video reproduction, retouching, and editing
Proficiency with editing software. CapCut is a must.
2. Strong attention to detail and creativity
3. Ability to meet deadlines and work independently

What We Offer:

1. Competitive project-based compensation
2. Flexible working hours
3. Opportunity to work on exciting projects
4. Potential for long-term collaboration

If you’re interested in joining our team, please contact us to discuss the opportunities further. We look forward to seeing your portfolio and hearing how you can contribute to our projects.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: CapCut, Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Product Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a videographer to enhance the marketability of our products through product highlights and assembly videos. We primarily sell outdoor furniture and garden decor to channels like Amazon and other large retailers. Prefer to send our products to be shot outdoors for a better lifestyle feel.

item.title: Create a series of 3 short videos in Canva for our website - Upwork
item.description:
We are a nonprofit in Oregon that focuses on homesharing. We want to create a series of short video templates to help people on our website. I would like the work to be done in Canva, so that I could adjust the timings and make the final video for posting.

The first video is for "What is Homesharing and How Does This Work?". The second video is for "Common Questions About Homesharing". I have video scripts for both and a general idea for images/visuals. I will provide voiceover and music. I just need your expertise to make it look great and cohesive with our website.  With homesharing, it's creating matches between older homeowners and renters of all ages. I would like video imagery that reflects that.

The third video would be a template of different types of clips with text overlay that I could use to make a future video. Ideally, these would just be within one Canva template and something I could use if we have another short video idea in the future.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:22 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, English, Content Writing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design, English, Content Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for Online Course (Michael C. ) - Upwork
item.description:
We have recorded single cam video for a pair of experts for their online course. We have audio backup, video backups, and the primary recording is delivered through Riverside.fm.

Final exports are 1080p.

We have marked-up scripts with edits and insert locations for slides.

Slides (images) provided as PDF/JPG.

Hourly Range: $30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
